title: Mobilithek

title: Data Intelligence Hub
description: Platform for the secure exchange, processing and analysis of data, which meets all the strict requirements of International Data Spaces Association (IDSA).

title: Portfolio

title: Weather forecast
description: Small project to check weather in any city around the world. Built using Vuetify.

title: Github Userboard
description: Top github users list. Built using Github open API.

title: Center of Reactive Programming
description: Marketing platform for Center of Reactive Programming. Previous and less fancy version, to be more precise 🌚

title: CML-Bench

title: Puma
description: Network access control system which provides control of workstation traffic.
